00034 #define           NUM_SMOKE_EFFECT_SLOTS                          25
00035 
00036 
00037 // GLOBAL FOR SMOKE LISTING
00038 SMOKEEFFECT                   gSmokeEffectData[ NUM_SMOKE_EFFECT_SLOTS ];
00039 UINT32                                    guiNumSmokeEffects = 0;
00040 
00041 
00042 INT32 GetFreeSmokeEffect( void );
00043 void RecountSmokeEffects( void );
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 INT32 GetFreeSmokeEffect( void )
00048 {
00049       UINT32 uiCount;
00050 
00051       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumSmokeEffects; uiCount++)
00052       {
00053             if(( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE ) )
00054                   return( (INT32)uiCount );
00055       }
00056 
00057       if( guiNumSmokeEffects < NUM_SMOKE_EFFECT_SLOTS )
00058             return( (INT32) guiNumSmokeEffects++ );
00059 
00060       return( -1 );
00061 }
00062 
00063 void RecountSmokeEffects( void )
00064 {
00065       INT32 uiCount;
00066 
00067       for(uiCount=guiNumSmokeEffects-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00068       {
00069             if( ( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated ) )
00070             {
00071                   guiNumSmokeEffects=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00072                   break;
00073             }
00074       }
00075 }

00080 // Returns NO_SMOKE_EFFECT if none there...
00081 INT8 GetSmokeEffectOnTile( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
00082 {
00083       UINT16            ubExtFlags;
00084 
00085       ubExtFlags = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[ bLevel ];
00086 
00087       // Look at worldleveldata to find flags..
00088       if ( ubExtFlags & ANY_SMOKE_EFFECT )
00089       {
00090             // Which smoke am i?
00091             return( FromWorldFlagsToSmokeType( ubExtFlags ) );
00092       }
00093 
00094       return( NO_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 INT8 FromWorldFlagsToSmokeType( UINT16 ubWorldFlags )
00099 {
00100       if ( ubWorldFlags & MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE )
00101       {
00102             return( NORMAL_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00103       }
00104       else if ( ubWorldFlags & MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS )
00105       {
00106             return( TEARGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00107       }
00108       else if ( ubWorldFlags & MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS )
00109       {
00110             return( MUSTARDGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00111       }
00112       else if ( ubWorldFlags & MAPELEMENT_EXT_CREATUREGAS )
00113       {
00114             return( CREATURE_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00115       }
00116       else if ( ubWorldFlags & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS )
00117       {
00118             return( BURNABLEGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00119       }
00120       else
00121       {
00122             return( NO_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00123       }
00124 }

00126 
00127 UINT16 FromSmokeTypeToWorldFlags( INT8 bType )
00128 {
00129       switch( bType )
00130       {
00131             case NORMAL_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00132 
00133                   return( MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE );
00134                   break;
00135 
00136             case TEARGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00137 
00138                   return( MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS );
00139                   break;
00140 
00141             case MUSTARDGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00142 
00143                   return( MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS );
00144                   break;
00145 
00146             case BURNABLEGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00147 
00148                   return( MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS );
00149                   break;
00150 
00151     case CREATURE_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00152       
00153       return( MAPELEMENT_EXT_CREATUREGAS );
00154       break;
00155 
00156             default:
00157 
00158                   return( 0 );
00159       }
00160 }

00164 INT32 NewSmokeEffect( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usItem, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubOwner )
00165 {
00166       SMOKEEFFECT *pSmoke;
00167       INT32                   iSmokeIndex;
00168       INT8                    bSmokeEffectType=0;
00169 
00170       if( ( iSmokeIndex = GetFreeSmokeEffect() )==(-1) )
00171             return(-1);
00172 
00173       memset( &gSmokeEffectData[ iSmokeIndex ], 0, sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ) );
00174 
00175       pSmoke = &gSmokeEffectData[ iSmokeIndex ];
00176 
00177       // Set some values...
00178       pSmoke->sGridNo                                                   = sGridNo;
00179       pSmoke->usItem                                                    = usItem;
00180       pSmoke->uiTimeOfLastUpdate                = GetWorldTotalSeconds( );
00181 
00182       // Are we indoors?
00183       if ( GetTerrainType( sGridNo ) == FLAT_FLOOR )
00184       {
00185             pSmoke->bFlags |= SMOKE_EFFECT_INDOORS;
00186       }
00187 
00188 
00189   switch( Explosive[Item[usItem].ubClassIndex].ubType )
00190   {
00191             case EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS:
00192 
00193                   bSmokeEffectType  =     MUSTARDGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT;
00194                   break;
00195 
00196             case EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS:
00197 
00198                   bSmokeEffectType  =     BURNABLEGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT;
00199                   break;
00200 
00201             case EXPLOSV_TEARGAS:
00202                   bSmokeEffectType  =     TEARGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
00203                   break;
00204 
00205             case EXPLOSV_SMOKE:
00206 
00207                   bSmokeEffectType  =     NORMAL_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
00208                   break;
00209 
00210    // case SMALL_CREATURE_GAS:
00211                   //bSmokeEffectType      =     CREATURE_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
00212                   //ubDuration                        = 3;
00213                   //ubStartRadius               = 1;
00214                   //break;
00215 
00216     case EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS:
00217                   bSmokeEffectType  =     CREATURE_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
00218                   break;
00219 
00220    // case VERY_SMALL_CREATURE_GAS:
00221 
00222                   //bSmokeEffectType      =     CREATURE_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
00223                   //ubDuration                        = 2;
00224                   //ubStartRadius               = 0;
00225       break;
00226   }
00227 
00228 
00229 
00230       pSmoke->ubDuration      = (UINT8)Explosive[ Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubDuration;
00231       pSmoke->ubRadius    = (UINT8)Explosive[ Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubStartRadius;
00232       pSmoke->bAge                        = 0;
00233       pSmoke->fAllocated  = TRUE;
00234       pSmoke->bType                       = bSmokeEffectType;
00235   pSmoke->ubOwner     = ubOwner;
00236 
00237   if ( pSmoke->bFlags & SMOKE_EFFECT_INDOORS )
00238   {    
00239             // Duration is increased by 2 turns...indoors
00240             pSmoke->ubDuration += 3;
00241   }
00242 
00243   if ( bLevel )
00244   {
00245     pSmoke->bFlags |= SMOKE_EFFECT_ON_ROOF;
00246   }
00247 
00248   // ATE: FALSE into subsequent-- it's the first one!
00249   SpreadEffect( pSmoke->sGridNo, pSmoke->ubRadius, pSmoke->usItem, pSmoke->ubOwner, FALSE, bLevel, iSmokeIndex );
00250 
00251       return( iSmokeIndex );
00252 }

00255 // Add smoke to gridno
00256 // ( Replacement algorithm uses distance away )
00257 void AddSmokeEffectToTile( INT32 iSmokeEffectID, INT8 bType, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
00258 {
00259       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00260       ANITILE                             *pAniTile;
00261       SMOKEEFFECT     *pSmoke;
00262   BOOLEAN         fDissipating = FALSE;
00263 
00264       pSmoke = &gSmokeEffectData[ iSmokeEffectID ];
00265 
00266   if ( ( pSmoke->ubDuration - pSmoke->bAge ) < 2 )
00267   {
00268     fDissipating = TRUE;
00269     // Remove old one...
00270     RemoveSmokeEffectFromTile( sGridNo, bLevel );
00271   }
00272 
00273 
00274       // If smoke effect exists already.... stop
00275       if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[ bLevel ] & ANY_SMOKE_EFFECT )
00276       {
00277             return;
00278       }
00279             
00280       // OK,  Create anitile....
00281       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00282       AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
00283 
00284   if ( bLevel == 0 )
00285   {
00286         AniParams.ubLevelID                                 = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
00287   }
00288   else
00289   {
00290         AniParams.ubLevelID                                 = ANI_ONROOF_LEVEL;
00291   }
00292 
00293 
00294       AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 300 + Random( 300 ) );
00295 
00296   if ( !( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ] ) )
00297   {
00298         AniParams.sStartFrame                         = (INT16)0;
00299   }
00300   else
00301   {
00302         AniParams.sStartFrame                         = (INT16)Random( 5 );
00303   }
00304 
00305 
00306       // Bare bones flags are...
00307 //    AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_OPTIMIZEFORSMOKEEFFECT | ANITILE_SMOKE_EFFECT | ANITILE_LOOPING;
00308       //AniParams.uiFlags                                         = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_SMOKE_EFFECT | ANITILE_LOOPING;
00309 
00310 
00311   if ( !( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ] ) )
00312   {
00313     AniParams.uiFlags   = ANITILE_PAUSED | ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_SMOKE_EFFECT | ANITILE_LOOPING;
00314   }
00315   else
00316   {
00317     AniParams.uiFlags   = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_SMOKE_EFFECT | ANITILE_LOOPING | ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT;
00318   }
00319 
00320       AniParams.sX                                                      = CenterX( sGridNo );
00321       AniParams.sY                                                      = CenterY( sGridNo );
00322       AniParams.sZ                                                      = (INT16)0;
00323 
00324       // Use the right graphic based on type..
00325       switch( bType )
00326       {
00327             case NORMAL_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00328 
00329       if ( !( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ] ) )
00330       {
00331                      strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\smkechze.STI" );                
00332       }
00333       else
00334       {
00335         if ( fDissipating )
00336         {
00337                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\smalsmke.STI" );               
00338         }
00339         else
00340         {
00341                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\SMOKE.STI" );                  
00342         }
00343       }
00344                   break;
00345 
00346             case TEARGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00347 
00348       if ( !( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ] ) )
00349       {
00350                      strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\tearchze.STI" );                
00351       }
00352       else
00353       {
00354         if ( fDissipating )
00355         {
00356                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\smaltear.STI" );               
00357         }
00358         else
00359         {
00360                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\TEARGAS.STI" );

00363                   break;
00364

00366

00368       {

00385

00388                      strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\FLAMCHZE.STI" );

00393         {
00394                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\smalflam.STI" );

00396         else
00397         {
00398                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\FLAMETH2.STI" );               
00399         }
00400       }
00401                   break;
00402 
00403             case CREATURE_SMOKE_EFFECT:
00404 
00405       if ( !( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ] ) )
00406       {
00407                      strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\spit_gas.STI" );                
00408       }
00409       else
00410       {
00411         if ( fDissipating )
00412         {
00413                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\spit_gas.STI" );               
00414         }
00415         else
00416         {
00417                       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\spit_gas.STI" );               
00418         }
00419       }
00420                   break;
00421 
00422       }
00423 
00424       // Create tile...
00425       pAniTile = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00426 
00427       // Set world flags
00428       gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[ bLevel ] |= FromSmokeTypeToWorldFlags( bType );
00429 
00430       // All done...
00431 
00432       // Re-draw..... :(
00433       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00434 }
00435 
00436 void RemoveSmokeEffectFromTile( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
00437 {
00438       ANITILE *pAniTile;
00439       UINT8       ubLevelID;
00440 
00441       // Get ANI tile...
00442       if ( bLevel == 0 )
00443       {
00444             ubLevelID = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
00445       }
00446       else
00447       {
00448             ubLevelID = ANI_ONROOF_LEVEL;
00449       }
00450 
00451       pAniTile = GetCachedAniTileOfType( sGridNo, ubLevelID, ANITILE_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00452       
00453       if ( pAniTile != NULL )
00454       {
00455             DeleteAniTile( pAniTile );
00456 
00457             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00458       }
00459 
00460       // Unset flags in world....
00461       // ( // check to see if we are the last one....
00462       if ( GetCachedAniTileOfType( sGridNo, ubLevelID, ANITILE_SMOKE_EFFECT ) == NULL )
00463       {
00464             gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[ bLevel ] &= ( ~ANY_SMOKE_EFFECT );
00465       }
00466 }

00468 
00469 void DecaySmokeEffects( UINT32 uiTime )
00470 {
00471       SMOKEEFFECT *pSmoke;
00472       UINT32      cnt, cnt2;
00473   BOOLEAN fUpdate = FALSE;
00474   BOOLEAN fSpreadEffect;
00475   INT8    bLevel;
00476   UINT16   usNumUpdates = 1;
00477 
00478       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
00479       {
00480             if ( MercSlots[ cnt ] )
00481             {
00482                   // reset 'hit by gas' flags
00483                   MercSlots[ cnt ]->fHitByGasFlags = 0;
00484             }
00485       }
00486 
00487   // ATE: 1 ) make first pass and delete/mark any smoke effect for update
00488   // all the deleting has to be done first///
00489 
00490   // age all active tear gas clouds, deactivate those that are just dispersing
00491   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumSmokeEffects; cnt++ )
00492   {
00493             fSpreadEffect = TRUE;
00494 
00495             pSmoke = &gSmokeEffectData[ cnt ];
00496             
00497             if ( pSmoke->fAllocated )
00498             {
00499       if ( pSmoke->bFlags & SMOKE_EFFECT_ON_ROOF )
00500       {
00501         bLevel = 1;
00502       }
00503       else
00504       {
00505         bLevel = 0;
00506       }
00507 
00508 
00509       // Do things differently for combat /vs realtime
00510       // always try to update during combat
00511       if (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00512       {
00513         fUpdate = TRUE;
00514       }
00515       else
00516       {
00517                     // ATE: Do this every so ofte, to acheive the effect we want...
00518                     if ( ( uiTime - pSmoke->uiTimeOfLastUpdate ) > 10 )
00519                     {
00520           fUpdate = TRUE;
00521 
00522           usNumUpdates = ( UINT16 ) ( ( uiTime - pSmoke->uiTimeOfLastUpdate ) / 10 );
00523         }
00524       }
00525 
00526       if ( fUpdate )
00527       {
00528                         pSmoke->uiTimeOfLastUpdate = uiTime;
00529 
00530         for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < usNumUpdates; cnt2++ )
00531         {
00532                           pSmoke->bAge++;
00533 
00534                               if ( pSmoke->bAge == 1 )
00535                               {
00536             // ATE: At least mark for update!
00537             pSmoke->bFlags |= SMOKE_EFFECT_MARK_FOR_UPDATE;
00538                                     fSpreadEffect = FALSE;
00539                               }
00540                               else
00541                               {
00542                                     fSpreadEffect = TRUE;
00543                               }
00544 
00545           if ( fSpreadEffect )
00546           {
00547                             // if this cloud remains effective (duration not reached)
00548                             if ( pSmoke->bAge <= pSmoke->ubDuration)
00549                             {
00550               // ATE: Only mark now and increse radius - actual drawing is done
00551               // in another pass cause it could
00552               // just get erased...
00553               pSmoke->bFlags |= SMOKE_EFFECT_MARK_FOR_UPDATE;
00554 
00555                               // calculate the new cloud radius
00556                               // cloud expands by 1 every turn outdoors, and every other turn indoors
00557 
00558               // ATE: If radius is < maximun, increase radius, otherwise keep at max
00559               if ( pSmoke->ubRadius < Explosive[ Item[ pSmoke->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubRadius )
00560               {
00561                                     pSmoke->ubRadius++;
00562               }
00563                             }
00564                       else
00565                             {
00566                                   // deactivate tear gas cloud (use last known radius)
00567                                   SpreadEffect( pSmoke->sGridNo, pSmoke->ubRadius, pSmoke->usItem, pSmoke->ubOwner, ERASE_SPREAD_EFFECT, bLevel, cnt );
00568                                   pSmoke->fAllocated = FALSE;
00569               break;
00570                             }
00571           }
00572         }
00573                   }
00574                   else
00575                   {
00576                         // damage anyone standing in cloud
00577                         SpreadEffect( pSmoke->sGridNo, pSmoke->ubRadius, pSmoke->usItem, pSmoke->ubOwner, REDO_SPREAD_EFFECT, 0, cnt );
00578                   }
00579     }
00580   }
00581 
00582   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumSmokeEffects; cnt++ )
00583   {
00584             pSmoke = &gSmokeEffectData[ cnt ];
00585             
00586             if ( pSmoke->fAllocated )
00587             {
00588       if ( pSmoke->bFlags & SMOKE_EFFECT_ON_ROOF )
00589       {
00590         bLevel = 1;
00591       }
00592       else
00593       {
00594         bLevel = 0;
00595       }
00596 
00597               // if this cloud remains effective (duration not reached)
00598               if ( pSmoke->bFlags & SMOKE_EFFECT_MARK_FOR_UPDATE )
00599                   {
00600                   SpreadEffect( pSmoke->sGridNo, pSmoke->ubRadius, pSmoke->usItem, pSmoke->ubOwner, TRUE, bLevel, cnt );
00601         pSmoke->bFlags &= (~SMOKE_EFFECT_MARK_FOR_UPDATE);
00602                   }
00603     }
00604   }
00605 
00606       AllTeamsLookForAll( TRUE );
00607 }

00656 
00657 BOOLEAN LoadSmokeEffectsFromLoadGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
00658 {
00659       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00660       UINT32      uiCount;
00661       UINT32      uiCnt=0;
00662   INT8    bLevel;
00663 
00664       //no longer need to load smoke effects.  They are now in temp files
00665       if( guiSaveGameVersion < 75 )
00666       {
00667             //Clear out the old list
00668             memset( gSmokeEffectData, 0, sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ) * NUM_SMOKE_EFFECT_SLOTS );
00669 
00670             //Load the Number of Smoke Effects
00671             FileRead( hFile, &guiNumSmokeEffects, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00672             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00673             {
00674                   return( FALSE );
00675             }
00676 
00677             //This is a TEMP hack to allow us to use the saves
00678             if( guiSaveGameVersion < 37 && guiNumSmokeEffects == 0 )
00679             {
00680                   //Load the Smoke effect Data
00681                   FileRead( hFile, gSmokeEffectData, sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00682                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ) )
00683                   {
00684                         return( FALSE );
00685                   }
00686             }
00687 
00688 
00689             //loop through and load the list
00690             for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<guiNumSmokeEffects;uiCnt++)
00691             {
00692                   //Load the Smoke effect Data
00693                   FileRead( hFile, &gSmokeEffectData[ uiCnt ], sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00694                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ) )
00695                   {
00696                         return( FALSE );
00697                   }
00698                   //This is a TEMP hack to allow us to use the saves
00699                   if( guiSaveGameVersion < 37 )
00700                         break;
00701             }
00702 
00703 
00704             //loop through and apply the smoke effects to the map
00705             for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumSmokeEffects; uiCount++)
00706             {
00707                   //if this slot is allocated
00708                   if( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated )
00709                   {
00710         if ( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].bFlags & SMOKE_EFFECT_ON_ROOF )
00711         {
00712           bLevel = 1;
00713         }
00714         else
00715         {
00716           bLevel = 0;
00717         }
00718 
00719                         SpreadEffect( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].sGridNo, gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].ubRadius, gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].usItem, gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].ubOwner, TRUE, bLevel, uiCount );
00720                   }
00721             }
00722       }
00723 
00724       return( TRUE );
00725 }
00726 
00727 
00728 BOOLEAN SaveSmokeEffectsToMapTempFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
00729 {
00730       UINT32      uiNumSmokeEffects=0;
00731       HWFILE      hFile;
00732       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00733       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00734       UINT32      uiCnt;
00735 
00736       //get the name of the map
00737       GetMapTempFileName( SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00738 
00739       //delete file the file.
00740       FileDelete( zMapName );
00741 
00742       //loop through and count the number of smoke effects
00743       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<guiNumSmokeEffects; uiCnt++)
00744       {
00745             if( gSmokeEffectData[ uiCnt ].fAllocated )
00746                   uiNumSmokeEffects++;
00747       }
00748 
00749       //if there are no smoke effects
00750       if( uiNumSmokeEffects == 0 )
00751       {
00752             //set the fact that there are no smoke effects for this sector
00753             ReSetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00754 
00755             return( TRUE );
00756       }
00757 
00758       //Open the file for writing
00759       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00760       if( hFile == 0 )
00761       {
00762             //Error opening file
00763             return( FALSE );
00764       }
00765 
00766 
00767       //Save the Number of Smoke Effects
00768       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumSmokeEffects, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00769       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00770       {
00771             //Close the file
00772             FileClose( hFile );
00773 
00774             return( FALSE );
00775       }
00776 
00777 
00778       //loop through and save the number of smoke effects
00779       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt < guiNumSmokeEffects; uiCnt++)
00780       {
00781             //if the smoke is active
00782             if( gSmokeEffectData[ uiCnt ].fAllocated )
00783             {
00784                   //Save the Smoke effect Data
00785                   FileWrite( hFile, &gSmokeEffectData[ uiCnt ], sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00786                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ) )
00787                   {
00788                         //Close the file
00789                         FileClose( hFile );
00790 
00791                         return( FALSE );
00792                   }
00793             }
00794       }
00795 
00796       //Close the file
00797       FileClose( hFile );
00798 
00799       SetSectorFlag( sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ, SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00800 
00801       return( TRUE );
00802 }
00803

00805 
00806 BOOLEAN LoadSmokeEffectsFromMapTempFile( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT8 bMapZ )
00807 {
00808       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00809       UINT32      uiCount;
00810       UINT32      uiCnt=0;
00811       HWFILE      hFile;
00812       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00813       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00814   INT8    bLevel;
00815 
00816       GetMapTempFileName( SF_SMOKE_EFFECTS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sMapX, sMapY, bMapZ );
00817 
00818       //Open the file for reading, Create it if it doesnt exist
00819       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00820       if( hFile == 0 )
00821       {
00822             //Error opening map modification file
00823             return( FALSE );
00824       }
00825 
00826       //Clear out the old list
00827       ResetSmokeEffects();
00828 
00829 
00830       //Load the Number of Smoke Effects
00831       FileRead( hFile, &guiNumSmokeEffects, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00832       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00833       {
00834             FileClose( hFile );
00835             return( FALSE );
00836       }
00837 
00838       //loop through and load the list
00839       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<guiNumSmokeEffects;uiCnt++)
00840       {
00841             //Load the Smoke effect Data
00842             FileRead( hFile, &gSmokeEffectData[ uiCnt ], sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00843             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ) )
00844             {
00845                   FileClose( hFile );
00846                   return( FALSE );
00847             }
00848       }
00849 
00850 
00851       //loop through and apply the smoke effects to the map
00852       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumSmokeEffects; uiCount++)
00853       {
00854             //if this slot is allocated
00855             if( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].fAllocated )
00856             {
00857       if ( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].bFlags & SMOKE_EFFECT_ON_ROOF )
00858       {
00859         bLevel = 1;
00860       }
00861       else
00862       {
00863         bLevel = 0;
00864       }
00865 
00866                   SpreadEffect( gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].sGridNo, gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].ubRadius, gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].usItem, gSmokeEffectData[uiCount].ubOwner, TRUE, bLevel, uiCount );
00867             }
00868       }
00869 
00870       FileClose( hFile );
00871 
00872       return( TRUE );
00873 }
00874 
00875 
00876 void ResetSmokeEffects()
00877 {
00878       //Clear out the old list
00879       memset( gSmokeEffectData, 0, sizeof( SMOKEEFFECT ) * NUM_SMOKE_EFFECT_SLOTS );
00880       guiNumSmokeEffects = 0;
00881 }
00882 
00883 
00884 void UpdateSmokeEffectGraphics( )
00885 {
00886   UINT32      uiCnt;
00887       SMOKEEFFECT *pSmoke;
00888   INT8        bLevel;
00889 
00890       //loop through and save the number of smoke effects
00891       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt < guiNumSmokeEffects; uiCnt++)
00892       {
00893             pSmoke = &gSmokeEffectData[ uiCnt ];
00894 
00895             //if the smoke is active
00896             if( gSmokeEffectData[ uiCnt ].fAllocated )
00897             {
00898       if ( gSmokeEffectData[uiCnt].bFlags & SMOKE_EFFECT_ON_ROOF )
00899       {
00900         bLevel = 1;
00901       }
00902       else
00903       {
00904         bLevel = 0;
00905       }
00906 
00907                   SpreadEffect( pSmoke->sGridNo, pSmoke->ubRadius, pSmoke->usItem, pSmoke->ubOwner, ERASE_SPREAD_EFFECT, bLevel, uiCnt );
00908 
00909             SpreadEffect( pSmoke->sGridNo, pSmoke->ubRadius, pSmoke->usItem, pSmoke->ubOwner, TRUE, bLevel, uiCnt );
00910     }
00911   }
00912 }
